checks.detail: pmns_candidates=6 (from 6 permutation scan; best chi2_fit=3.159 chi2_holdout=13.257)

formulas: holdout split: fit on 7 CKM entries; hold out the small elements Vub and Vtd
no continuous tuning; only discrete convention choices
inputs: SM mt boundary conditions: tfpt_suite/rge_sm.py (from sm_inputs_mz.json)
spec.name: Unconventional: flavor holdout search (discrete CKM phase-map conventions)

validation: all candidates are evaluated deterministically and yield finite χ² values
report the best candidate under the holdout protocol
